issue.title: [C++] Make index kernel work in exec plans
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13591](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13591). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As written, it gives the wrong result because it's order-dependent. Needs ARROW-13540 for ordering.
